author: bridge-bot
content:
<Highlander1969> Reminder for those interested, the L2 Standards WG will continue discussing tomorrow, Wednesday (December 11, at 7 am PT / 10 am ET / 15:00 GMT / 16:00 CET / 6:30 pm IST ) 

PR for L2 Transaction Status standard: https://github.com/ethereum-oasis-op/L2/pull/55

PR for L2 Transaction Fee API standard: https://github.com/ethereum-oasis-op/L2/pull/53

Meeting zoom link is here:
https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81599021689?pwd=VmxPVUNCVmE5RkkweGY1YmN1OWMrZz09

author: bridge-bot
content:
<CarlBeek> RollCall #9 is happening in 15 hours,

Notable discussion points are:
- EIP-7762 - Increase `MIN_BASE_FEE_PER_BLOB_GAS`
- Discussion about removing `eth_feeHistory`, of specfic interest to L2s is [`blobGasUsedRatio`](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/7c9772f95c2472ccfc6f6128dc2e1b568284a2da/src/eth/fee_market.yaml#L102)

Your feedback on these points will help shape decisions made on the L1, so if either of these are relevant to you, make sure you have a representative present.

When: Dec 11, 14h00 UTC
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1172
Zoom link posted here just before the call

author: bridge-bot
content:
<timbeiko> > Your feedback on these points will help shape decisions made on the L1, so if either of these are relevant to you, make sure you have a representative present.

To make this even more explicit: we are making final decisions on Pectra specs on this Thursday's AllCoreDevs. Whether to include EIP-7762 or not is the biggest remaining item. *If you have feedback, whether positive or negative, please try and communicate it on the call (or async ahead of time if you can't join).* (re @CarlBeek: RollCall #9 is happening in 15 hours,

Notable discussion points are:
- EIP-7762 - Increase MIN_BASE_FEE_PER_BLOB_GAS
- Discussion about removing eth_feeHistory, of specfic interest to L2s is [blobGasUsedRatio](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/blob/7c9772f95c2472ccfc6f6128dc2e1b568284a2da/src/eth/fee_market.yaml#L102)

Your feedback on these points will help shape decisions made on the L1, so if either of these are relevant to you, make sure you have a representative present.

When: Dec 11, 14h00 UTC
Agenda: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1172
Zoom link posted here just before the call)
